name: A Spirit's Rescue
description:
A Spirit's Rescue

"A spirit wanders the land aimlessly. They’ve no purpose, they feel lost and alone. One fateful day, they happen across a crown. But this is no ordinary crown, the great wizard Aphodel  is trapped within. In order to regain his form and leave these caves he needs to gather up the magical spirits which were forced out of him when he was trapped in the crown. The lonely spirit agrees to help, it dons the crown and sets off on an incredible journey to reunite the spirits and free the wizard once and for all".
